title: Profile Champion Background
body:
Will we be able to customize which champion will be our profile background?
How do I change it now? If we will be able to change it, will we be able to change it to skin art too (not just classic champion art)?

replies.body: At the moment it depicts your "recently played", the champion that in legacy client shows with a position when you hover over someone (or yourself) on your friends list. The exceptions are if you wear the icons for the ultimate skins, in which case it will show the animated splash for that skin configuration.

I recently played 4 games as Tristana (thus I have Tris on the new client) but I also (until now) played 5 games in a row as Soraka...
I'm guessing it'll take some time for LoLClient to register it?
Yeah, not sure on specifics, but I think it does take a little time.
